body_html:
@aselle, we have added a fix for decode_raw_op_test in the PR.

According to the readme the tf.decode_raw has an attribute little_endian whose default value is set to true in parsing_ops.cc (flag ignored for uint8).
If we set the value of the flag to False for big endian, the assert for endianness check doesn't fail on either systems (little endian or big endian) and the following data copying works on both systems.
